Package sysobj

Class Player

java.lang.Object
sysobj.Player
Direct Known Subclasses:
AIPlayer
public class Player extends Object
Players have a name, a hand of cards, a score, an orientation in the UI, and a flag for if they are human or not.
Since:
23

  • Method Details

    • addCardToHand

      public void addCardToHand(Card card)
      Adds a card to this player's hand. Checks that the hand is not full before adding the card to it.
      Parameters:
      card - - The card to be added to the hand.
      Since:
      23

    • hasLegalMove

      public boolean hasLegalMove(Card lastPlayedCard)
      Determines if the player has any legal moves based on the status of the last played card. This is used to force players into certain actions or to force the player to pass the turn.
      Parameters:
      lastPlayedCard - - The last card on the played cards pile.
      Returns:
      true if they have a legal move, false if not.
      Since:
      23

    • isHuman

      public boolean isHuman()
      Returns the value of the "isHuman" flag.
      Returns:
      the value of the flag. True = human, false = AI.
      Since:
      23
